医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
昆士兰大学研究人员揭示了狼牙病毒融合蛋白的结构研究人员揭示了一种最近从动物转移到人类的高度传染性病毒如何能够进入人类细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/UQ-researchers-uncover-the-struct-of-Langya-virus-fusion- Protein.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/UQ-researchers-uncover-the-struct-of-Langya-virus-fusion- Protein.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c43eaf68-278f-447c-98bc-7db1366449f7 Thu, 22 Jun 2023 09:54:18 -0400 UQ researchers uncover the structure of Langya virus' fusion protein
较低的饮食碳水化合物/脂肪比例可能有效提高认知能力研究表明，低膳食碳水化合物/脂肪比例有利于有痴呆风险的老年人的认知健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/A-lower-dietary-carboHydratefat-ratio-may-be- effective-in-improving-cognitive-performance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/A-lower-dietary-carboHydratefat-ratio-may-be- effective-in-improving-cognitive-performance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bfd4eb6-73bb-4cdb-8bbc-a27864250614 Thu, 22 Jun 2023 08:58:00 -0400 A lower dietary carbohydrate/fat ratio may be effective in improving cognitive performance
Owlstone Medical 提供的数据表明肝硬化和 NASH 呼吸活检测试的开发进展Owlstone Medical（“Owlstone”）是早期疾病检测和精准医学应用的呼吸活检®领域的全球领导者，今天公布了有关肝病检测新型测试开发的新数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/Owlstone-Medical-presents-data-demonstrating-progress-in-development-of-breath-biopsy-tests-for-liver-cithrosis-and-NASH。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/Owlstone-Medical-presents-data-demonstrating-progress-in-development-of-breath-biopsy-tests-for-liver-cithrosis-and-NASH。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c84ac6f7-111b-48c7-a064-945716ab8385 Thu, 22 Jun 2023 08:03:00 -0400 Owlstone Medical presents data demonstrating progress in development of breath biopsy tests for liver cirrhosis and NASH
三七总皂苷（血塞通软胶囊）能否改善缺血性中风患者的功能？研究人员检查了使用三七皂苷治疗成人缺血性中风的有效性和安全性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/Do-Panax-notoginseng-saponins-(Xuesaitong-soft-capsules)-improve-function-in-病人-with-ischemic-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/Do-Panax-notoginseng-saponins-(Xuesaitong-soft-capsules)-improve-function-in-病人-with-ischemic-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=461bb754-2cc5-4c85-8710-ce076a25d6e3 Thu, 22 Jun 2023 06:29:00 -0400 Do Panax notoginseng saponins (Xuesaitong soft capsules) improve function in patients with ischemic stroke?
揭示人类肠道解剖学中隐藏的多样性在这次采访中，我们采访了参与最近一项研究的研究人员，该研究发现人类肠道的解剖结构存在显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/Uncovering-Hidden-Diversity-in-Human-Gut-Anatomy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/Uncovering-Hidden-Diversity-in-Human-Gut-Anatomy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca2aaece-46df-40e2-ad6a-7beba80f691f Thu, 22 Jun 2023 06:04:00 -0400 Uncovering Hidden Diversity in Human Gut Anatomy
看不见的威胁：燃气灶用苯污染室内空气研究人员根据燃烧量化了苯排放因子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/The-invisible-threat-gas-stoves-contaminate-indoor-air-with-苯.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/The-invisible-threat-gas-stoves-contaminate-indoor-air-with-苯.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a57a9c8-917c-4017-b461-9907025b0ded Thu, 22 Jun 2023 06:02:00 -0400 The invisible threat: gas stoves contaminate indoor air with benzene
研究得出关于 12 岁以下儿童的 COVID-19 疫苗接种和既往 SARS-CoV-2 感染情况的重要发现最近的一项研究调查了儿童先前感染过 COVID-19 并接种疫苗对随后感染 SARS-CoV-2 Omicron 变种的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/Study-yields-important-findings-about-COVID-19-vaccination-and-previous-SARS-CoV-2-infection-in-children-younger-超过 12 年.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/Study-yields-important-findings-about-COVID-19-vaccination-and-previous-SARS-CoV-2-infection-in-children-younger-超过 12 年.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cdf4174-7fe2-4be6-9fb0-a609708b4f7e Thu, 22 Jun 2023 05:37:00 -0400 Study yields important findings about COVID-19 vaccination and previous SARS-CoV-2 infection in children younger than 12 years
初级保健患者焦虑筛查和治疗的益处和危害以及检测焦虑的仪器的准确性来自美国的研究人员回顾了焦虑筛查和治疗的风险和益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/The-benefits-and-harms-of-screening-and-treatment-for-anxiety-and-the-accuracy-of-instruments-to-detect-初级保健患者的焦虑.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/The-benefits-and-harms-of-screening-and-treatment-for-anxiety-and-the-accuracy-of-instruments-to-detect-初级保健患者的焦虑.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5839b5ce-6867-4175-af95-819d8bc04474 Thu, 22 Jun 2023 05:35:00 -0400 The benefits and harms of screening and treatment for anxiety and the accuracy of instruments to detect anxiety among primary care patients
妊娠期微观和亚微观疟疾：系统评价和荟萃分析调查患病率和相关危险因素研究人员进行了系统评价，以描述妊娠期间亚显微和显微疟疾感染的流行病学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/Microsensitive-and-submicrosensitive-malaria-in-pregnancy-a-systematic-review-and-meta-analysis-investigates-prevalence-and-linked-risk-因素.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/Microsensitive-and-submicrosensitive-malaria-in-pregnancy-a-systematic-review-and-meta-analysis-investigates-prevalence-and-linked-risk- Factors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4cb96dec-99f7-429c-a234-34294461ce35 Thu, 22 Jun 2023 05:18:00 -0400 Microscopic and submicroscopic malaria in pregnancy: a systematic review and meta-analysis investigates prevalence and associated risk factors
对无症状成年人进行焦虑症筛查的好处和坏处研究人员研究了成人焦虑症筛查的不同方面。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/The-benefits-and-harms-of-screening-for-anxiety-disorders-in-asymptomatic-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/The-benefits-and-harms-of-screening-for-anxiety-disorders-in-asymptomatic-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2df99d0-238a-4eba-ae2a-dd99f3212025 Thu, 22 Jun 2023 05:13:00 -0400 The benefits and harms of screening for anxiety disorders in asymptomatic adults
